text: The multiple forms editor doesn't save the content.
creator: andreas@apache.org
andreas@apache.org
text:
Saving works now, but intermediate changes are lost. I guess that's for the same
reason as bug 42237.

creator: andreas@apache.org
text: Yes, the patch for bug 42237 fixes this issue too.

creator: nettings@apache.org
text:
i consider this a blocker, since it means that users will lose data if they try it.
if it can't be fixed, the forms editor should be deactivated.

creator: andreas@apache.org
text: I applied the patch for bug 42237.
